meanings.sent1: I need to updated my phone to the newest software version.
meanings.sent2: She updated her wardrobe with some trendy new clothes.
meanings.sent3: The old computer tried to updated itself, but it just ended up crashing.
meanings.sent4: Her hairstyle was like an outdated fashion magazine until she updated it with a modern cut.
meanings.sent5: The city skyline was updated with a stunning new skyscraper.

meanings.sent1: The company updated their logo to have a sleeker design.
meanings.sent2: He updated his resume to include his most recent work experience.
meanings.sent3: The ancient knight tried to updated his armor with some shiny new pieces.
meanings.sent4: Her vintage dress was updated with a splash of vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The classic car was updated with state-of-the-art technology.

meanings.sent1: The news website is constantly updated with breaking stories.
meanings.sent2: She updated her friend about the upcoming party details.
meanings.sent3: The talking robot was programmed to updated the astronauts on the mission.
meanings.sent4: The teacher updated the students on the change in the exam schedule.
